events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I bought last week because it does not fit as expected.
The reported issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster after reviewing the customer request.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the jacket order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I will assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in the original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and I still have the original packaging intact.
Thank you for the details. We can proceed with the refund once you ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will send.
That sounds good, I appreciate the quick response and will send the package back as soon as I receive the label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should be reflected in your account shortly.
Just following up to confirm you have received the refund for your returned jacket. Please let us know if there is anything else.
As the refund has been processed and confirmed, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
